data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 2,573,262 lost people in  Raigarh, Maharashtra, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Raigarh, Maharashtra, India

data.prayer: Father, move the 28,976 believers in the county of Raigarh to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Raigarh.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Raigarh. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Alwar people. Make the Alwar people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Raigarh, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Raigarh, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary:
the county of Raigarh, Maharashtra, India has a population of 2,634,200.

We estimate Raigarh has 28,976 people who might know Jesus, 31,962 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,573,262 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Raigarh, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.
